patthana17.29:4.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ vipākaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho navipāko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.29:4.3: Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha … pe … aññamaññe tīṇi … pe … avigate cha.
patthana17.29:5.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ vipākadhammadhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho navipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.29:5.3: Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha … pe … avigate cha.
patthana17.29:6.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nanevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
